entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or lose one language it knows how to speak for 1 hour. Until this effect ends on the target, the solesik makes attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws with advantage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The soulkeeper's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}). The soulkeeper can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the soulkeeper fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: A soulkeeper has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The soulkeeper's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Sense Corruption
entries: The soulkeeper knows the exact location of each chaotic evil creature within 1,000 feet of itself. Such creatures cannot hide from the soulkeeper.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The soulkeeper deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Tremorstomp {@recharge}
entries: The soulkeeper can take a bonus action to leap into the air and land with tremendous force, sending a shock wave that spreads out through the ground in a 100-foot radius centered on a point in the soulkeeper's space, turning the ground in the area into difficult terrain. Each Huge or smaller creature on the ground in the area must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The soulkeeper makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Battle Growth
entries: Each time the torthen deals damage to a creature, its size increases by one category, such that a Tiny torthen becomes

Small and a Small torthen becomes Medium. It remains at this new size for 1 hour, at which point it returns to its normal size. If the torthen's new size increases the amount of space it takes up, it pushes creatures occupying those spaces 5 feet to accommodate its new size.

If there is not space to accommodate the torthen's new size, it takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage and its size does not change. The torthen gains benefits based on its current size, as listed:

items: At Medium size, the torthen's melee attacks deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.
At Large size, the torthen's speed becomes 50 feet, its reach becomes 10 feet, and its melee attacks deal an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) damage.
At Huge size, the torthen's speed becomes 60 feet, its reach becomes 15 feet, and its melee attacks deal an extra 22 ({@damage 4d10}) damage.
At Gargantuan size, the torthen's speed becomes 70 feet, its reach becomes 20 feet, and its melee attacks deal an extra 52 ({@damage 8d12}) damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The torthen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The torthen's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the torthen reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the torthen can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The torthen makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The undelon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}). The undelon can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Enamoring Gaze
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the undelon and the two of them can see each other, the undelon can force the creature to make a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw if the undelon isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature magically becomes {@condition charmed} for 1 hour. If the creature cannot see the undelon and is not within 30 feet of it, the creature can repeat the saving throw and ends the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw or ends the effect on itself becomes immune to this undelon's Enamoring Gaze for 24 hours.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the undelon until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again.
If it looks at the undelon in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
The undelon is immune to its own gaze.

trait.name: Humiliating Compulsion
entries: As a bonus action, the undelon targets one creature within 60 feet that is {@condition charmed} by it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, move up to 20 feet toward the undelon, and then fall {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The undelon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The undelon's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Delicious Suffering {@recharge 4}
entries: The undelon stimulates the pleasure centers of creatures it has {@condition charmed} that are within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage and become {@condition stunned} for 1 round.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The xaiex's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). The xaiex can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Corrupt Beasts
entries: While not {@condition incapacitated} and while in the form of a beast, the xaiex can corrupt ordinary beasts who match its form and that are within 60 feet of it. In giant rat form, the demon affects giant rats, rats, and swarms of giant rats. In jackal form, the demon affects hyenas and jackals. In raven form, the demon affects ravens and swarms of ravens. Each beast matching the xaiex's current form that starts its turn within 60 feet of the demon must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or have its alignment change to chaotic evil. While its alignment is chaotic evil, the affected creature is friendly to the demon and obeys its mental commands. In addition, weapon attacks made by such creatures deal an additional
{@damage 1d6} damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The xaiex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The xaiex's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The xaiex can use its action to polymorph into a giant rat, jackal, or raven, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} om te raken, reikwijdte 5 ft., één doel. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slagen schade.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the zallax moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The zallax can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The zallax has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The zallax's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The zallax can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zallax makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its horn.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or have its body flayed by the zallax's claws. A flayed creature makes attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws with disadvantage until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Cresil's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 22}). Cresil can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of Weakness
entries: Cresil emits an aura of soul-draining energy in a 30-foot radius. Each creature that is not a construct, fiend, or undead that starts its turn in the area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or become weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened target makes attack rolls with disadvantage, and its melee weapon attacks deal half damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Cresil fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Cresil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Cresil's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Cresil makes two flail attacks. Cresil can cast a spell in place of one of these attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@dice 2d6}) fire plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 4d12 + 8}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Drag Close
entries: Cresil makes a flail attack. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet toward Cresil.

legendary.name: Foul Excretion
entries: Cresil casts {@spell poison spray}.

legendary.name: Devour (2 actions)
entries: Cresil makes a bite attack.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, Eurynomus can move up to his speed toward a hostile creature that he can see.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Eurynomus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Eurynomus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Eurynomus's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Eurynomus makes three attacks: two with his claws and one with his tail slap. If he hits the same target with both claws attacks, he can take a bonus action to attack with his toothy maw.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Slap
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Toothy Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Corrosive Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Eurynomus exhales foul, corrosive gas from the depths of his bowels in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 20 ({@damage 8d4}) acid damage and 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: Eurynomus moves up to his speed.

legendary.name: Brutal Tail
entries: Eurynomus attacks with his tail slap. If he hits and the total of his attack roll beat the target's AC by 5 or more, the target also moves {@dice 1d6} [ts] 5 feet away from Eurynomus.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Malohin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). Malohin can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Defy Detection
entries: Malohin can't be targeted by divination magic, cannot be perceived through scrying sensors, and cannot be detected by any effect or ability that senses demons or fiends.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: Malohin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Malohin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Malohin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Malohin's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Malohin can use his Frightful Presence. He then makes three attacks: one with his claws, one with his bite, and one with his stomp. He can cast a spell in place of his stomp attack.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. Malohin can grapple one target at a time. If the target is already {@condition grappled} by Malohin, the target takes an additional 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Malohin's choice that is within 120 feet of Malohin and aware of him must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to
Malohin's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Possession (1/Day)
entries: One humanoid that Malohin can see within 5 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw or be possessed by Malohin. Malohin then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. Malohin now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. Malohin can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and he retains his alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. He otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, Malohin ends it as a bonus action, or Malohin is forced out by an effect like the {@spell dispel evil and good} spell. When the possession ends, Malohin reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to Malohin's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

legendary.name: Invisibility
entries: Malohin casts {@spell invisibility} on himself.

legendary.name: Claws
entries: Malohin attacks with his claws.

legendary.name: Harm (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Malohin casts {@spell harm}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Merihim's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 21}). Merihim can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Disease Stems
entries: Six prehensile fleshy stems that each end in toothy maws emerge from Merihim's monstrous back. Noxious fumes billow out from these stems at the start of each of Merihim's turns.
The bodily gases spread out in a 30-foot radius and remain until the start of Merihim's next turn or until dispersed by a strong wind.

Each creature that starts its turn in the area must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw. Constructs, fiends, and undead are immune to this effect. On a failed save, the creature contracts a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target is {@condition poisoned} and can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.
A target that successfully saves against this effect becomes immune to Merihim's Disease Stems for 24 hours.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Merihim fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Merihim has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Merihim's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Merihim regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Merihim makes two attacks: one with his claws and one with his palsied hand. Merihim can substitute Rend or
Smotherfume for his claws attack. Merihim can cast a spell in place of his palsied hand attack.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and
Merihim can't use his claws on another target.

action.name: Palsied Hand
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit with disadvantage, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage, and the target must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. While diseased in this way, the target is {@condition poisoned} and must repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns or reduce its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies and its soul wriggles free to become a manes under Merihim's control. A target that succeeds on the initial saving throw is immune to the effects of the disease for 24 hours. The disease can be removed only by a {@spell heal} spell or another disease-curing spell that is 6th level or higher.

action.name: Rend
entries: Merihim tears the flesh of a creature he has {@condition grappled}. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or take 29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Smotherfume
entries: Merihim lifts one creature he has {@condition grappled} and hangs it over his Disease Stems. The creature is subject to the effects of Merihim's Disease Stems and makes the saving throw with disadvantage.

legendary.name: Rend
entries: Merihim uses his Rend attack.

legendary.name: Spreading the Disease
entries: Merihim blights a creature he can see within 120 feet with a disease. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution spell or be subject to the effects of the {@spell contagion} spell.

legendary.name: Smother in Fumes
entries: Merihim uses his Smotherfume attack.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Philotanus's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 24}). Philotanus can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Philotanus is an 18th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 24}). Philotanus has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Philotanus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Philotanus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Philotanus's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Philotanus attacks twice with his rapier.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage. If Philotanus scores a critical hit, he rolls damage three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Charm
entries: Philotanus magically attempts to charm a creature he can see within 120 feet. If the target can hear him, the target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition charmed} by Philotanus for 24 hours. The target can repeat the saving throw whenever it takes damage from Philotanus, ending the effect on itself on a successful save. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw against this effect or to end it becomes immune to Philotanus's
Charm for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Philotanus makes a melee attack.

legendary.name: Charming Words
entries: Philotanus uses his Charm action.

legendary.name: Come to Me
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by Philotanus that Philotanus can see must use its reaction to move up to its speed toward him and grants advantage to Philotanus's attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Slip Away
entries: Philotanus casts {@spell dimension door} or hold person.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rahu's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 21}). Rahu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: Rahu has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: Rahu is immune to any effect that would sense his emotions or read his thoughts, as well as any divination spell that he refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain Rahu's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Rahu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Rahu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Rahu's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Rahu regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

Truth through Pain. Rahu can take a bonus action to ask a question of one creature within 120 feet of him that he can see. The target must make a {@dc 21} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target must answer the question truthfully and to the best of its knowledge. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to
Rahu's Truth through Pain for 24 hours.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: Rahu uses his torture tools on one creature he has {@condition grappled}. Choose one of the listed effects. A regeneration spell or healing magic of the same or higher level that's cast upon the target ends the effect on it.

action.name: • Don't Look at Me Like That
entries: Rahu sticks pins into the target's eyes. The target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) piercing damage and is {@condition blinded}.
• Not the Face! Rahu uses hooks to mutilate the target's face.
The target makes all Charisma attack rolls, checks, and saving throws with disadvantage.
• Kneel before Rahu. Rahu uses a serrated blade to cut the tendons in the back of the target's legs. The target can't stand up and can move only by crawling.

action.name: • That's Enough Out of You
entries: Rahu crushes the target's larynx with a pair of rusty pliers. The target cannot speak.
• Unhand Me! Rahu saws off one of the target's hands.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Rahu magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Amplify Pain
entries: Rahu amplifies the pain of one creature he can see within 120 feet. If the target doesn't have all of its hit points, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Rahu attacks with his claws.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Rahu uses his Teleport action.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with silver weapons

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Nergal's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). Nergal can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magische duisternis belemmert het zicht van de duivel niet.

trait.name: Flesh-Eating Weapons
entries: Nergal's weapon attacks are magical. When

Nergal hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage (included in the attack) and the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be affected by flesh rot as if Nergal had cast the spell on the target.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Nergal fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Nergal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nergal makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Wounding Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage (see Flesh-Eating Weapons). Hit points lost to this weapon's damage can be regained only through a short or long rest, rather than by regeneration, magic, or any other means.

action.name: Mass Contagion (1/Day)
entries: Nergal releases a cloud of pestilence from his space that spreads out and around corners in a 120-foot radius and then dissipates. Up to twenty creatures Nergal chooses in the area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be subject to the effects of the {@spell contagion} spell.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Nergal makes a wounding spiked chain attack.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Nergal magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, to an unoccupied space he can see within 120 feet.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Nergal innately casts a spell.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Bune's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 25}). Bune can innately cast the following spells, requiring no verbal or material components:

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: Any creature hostile to Bune that starts its turn within 20 feet of him must make a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw, unless Bune is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to Bune's Aura of Menace for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Blasphemous Benediction
entries: As a bonus action, Bune can touch one creature within 10 feet of him. If the target is evil or has any corruption, it makes attack rolls with advantage and its weapon attacks deal an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage for 1 minute.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Bune knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Fallen Weapons
entries: Bune's weapon attacks are magical. When Bune hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Bune fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Bune has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unsettling Presence
entries: A 150-foot radius of disturbance extends out from Bune, moves with him, and spreads around corners. Each beast that starts its turn in the area or moves into it must make a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw. The creature becomes {@condition frightened} for 1 minute on a failed save, or becomes immune to Bune's Unsettling Presence for 24 hours on a successful one. A creature {@condition frightened} in this way must take the Dash action on each of its turns to move away from Bune by the safest available route.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Bune makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Bune magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Hateful Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Bune emits magical divine energy.

Each creature of his choice in a 10-foot radius must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Implosion Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Bune targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. If the target can see him, the target must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) force damage. If the damage drops the target to 0 hit points, it collapses in upon itself with a sickening pop and dies instantly.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Iblis's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 27}). Iblis can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Iblis knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Fallen Weapons
entries: Iblis's weapon attacks are magical. When Iblis hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Iblis fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Iblis has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Iblis makes two greatsword attacks or three longbow attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) slashing damage plus 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Slaying Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 15} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage plus 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage. If the target is a creature that has 100 hit points or fewer, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or die.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Iblis makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Iblis magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Probe Soul
entries: Iblis examines the soul of one creature he can see within 120 feet. Until he takes this legendary action again or becomes {@condition incapacitated}, Iblis has advantage on all attack rolls he makes against the target.

legendary.name: Flames of Hatred (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Iblis releases the magical fire of his hate. Each creature of his choice in a 20-foot radius must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Thwart Magic (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Iblis chooses one creature, object, or magical effect that he can see and automatically ends any spell on the target that is 7th level or lower.

legendary.name: Killing Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Iblis targets one creature he can see within 90 feet of him. If the target can see him and has 90 hit points or less, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or die.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: De aangeboren tovervaardigheid van de gevallen engel is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit met spell attacks). De gevallen engel kan van nature de volgende spreuken uitspreken, waarvoor geen materiële componenten nodig zijn:

trait.name: Accursed Weapons
entries: De wapenaanvallen van de gevallen engel zijn magisch.
When the fallen angel hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Blasphemous Benediction
entries: As a bonus action, the fallen angel can touch one creature within 5 feet of her. If the target is evil or has any corruption, it makes attack rolls with advantage and its weapon attacks deal an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage for 1 minute.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Naamah has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: Naamah has five heads. While she has more than one head, she has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever Naamah takes 20 or more damage in a single turn, one of her heads dies. If all of her heads die, she dies.
At the end of her turn, Naamah regrows one of her heads, unless she has taken acid or fire damage since her last turn. Naamah regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Unsettling Presence
entries: A 30-foot radius of disturbance extends out from the fallen angel, moves with her, and spreads around corners.

Elk beest dat zijn beurt in het gebied begint of zich erheen beweegt moet een {@dc 25} Wijsheidspoging doen. Het schepsel wordt {@condition frightened} voor 1 minuut bij een mislukte redding, of wordt immuun voor de gevallen engel's

Unsettling Presence voor 24 uur op een succesvolle. Een schepsel {@condition frightened} op deze manier moet de Dash actie doen op elk van zijn beurten om weg te gaan van de gevallen engel via de veiligste beschikbare route.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fallen angel makes two flail attacks and as many bite attacks as she has heads.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage. If

Naamah scores a critical hit against a creature, the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A {@condition stunned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The fallen angel magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than her own, or back into her true form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the Naamah's choice). Naamah reverts to her true form if she dies.

In a new form, Naamah retains her game statistics and ability to speak, but her AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and she gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but she lacks.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: Naamah makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Wriggling Move
entries: Naamah moves up to her speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Abyssal Darkness {@recharge}
entries: As a bonus action, the chernobue casts the {@spell darkness} spell.

trait.name: Aura of Misfortune
entries: The chernobue emits an aura of evil malaise that spreads out in a 30-foot radius. Whenever a creature that isn't a fiend starts its turn in the aura, it must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature makes attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws with disadvantage until the end of its next turn, while on a successful save, the creature becomes immune to this chernobue's Aura of Misfortune for 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The chernobue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The chernobue's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the chernobue has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chernobue makes four attacks: two with its antennae mouth and two with its tail. It can substitute a bite for one of these attacks.

action.name: Antennae Mouth
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage at the end of each of its turns until it regains any number of hit points or uses an action to stanch the wound.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) slashing damage and the chernobue pulls the target 5 feet toward itself.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or become hideously deformed by the appearance of sucking orifices that appear all over the target's body. While deformed in this way, the target's hit point maximum is reduced by 10 and it makes attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws with disadvantage. In addition, whenever the target takes damage, it sprays filth from its orifices in a 5-foot radius. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be hideously deformed as described above.
A hideously deformed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of a long rest, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Fascination (1/Day)
entries: The chernobue changes its coloration and posture to create a beguiling display that overloads the senses of creatures who can see it. Each creature within 30 feet of the chernobue that is not a fiend must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. At the end of each of the {@condition incapacitated} creature's turns or whenever it takes damage, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this chernobue's Fascination for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Genital Maw
entries: When a creature moves to within 5 feet of the chernobue, it can make a bite attack against that creature.

reaction.name: Hijack Summoning (1/Week)
entries: When a fiend within 120 feet of the chernobue is being summoned to appear in another plane, the fiend does not appear and the chernobue goes in its place.

trait.name: Acid Spray
entries: Whenever the nyogoth takes piercing or slashing damage, it sprays from its body corrosive fluid. Each creature within 5 feet of the nyogoth must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) acid damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nyogoth makes five attacks: four with its maw and one with its bite.

action.name: Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Teleport (3/Day)
entries: The nyogoth teleports to an unoccupied space that it can see within 120 feet of itself.

action.name: Fascination (1/Day)
entries: The nyogoth changes its coloration and posture to create a beguiling display that overloads the senses of creatures who can see it. Each creature within 30 feet of the nyogoth that is not a fiend must succeed on a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. At the end of each of the {@condition incapacitated} creature's turns or whenever it takes damage, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to
Fascination for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Shiggarreb is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). Shiggarreb has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Shiggarreb fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Shiggarreb has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Shiggarreb's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Shiggarreb makes a claws attack, a bite attack, and a slam attack. She can cast a spell in place of her claws attack.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Shiggarreb magically polymorphs into a Large or smaller humanoid that has a challenge rating equal to or less than her own, or back into her true form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Shiggarreb's choice). She reverts to her true form if she dies.

In a new form, Shiggarreb retains her game statistics and ability to speak, but her AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and she gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but she lacks.

action.name: Fascination (1/Day)
entries: Shiggarreb changes her coloration and posture to create a beguiling display that overloads the senses of creatures who can see it. Each creature within 30 feet of Shiggarreb that is not a fiend must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. At the end of each of the {@condition incapacitated} creature's turns or whenever it takes damage, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to Fascination for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Shiggarreb makes a melee attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Shiggarreb moves up to her speed.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Shiggarreb casts a spell.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The shoggti's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Superior Evasion
entries: When the shoggti is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shoggti makes four tentacle attacks. The shoggti can substitute its Braincloud attack for one tentacle attack.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}.
The shoggti has four tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Braincloud
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or be subject to a Braincloud. Until this effect ends, whenever the target would take an action, bonus action, or reaction, the target must repeat the saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can repeat the saving throw and ends the effect on itself on a success.
A target that succeeds on the saving throw or ends the effect is immune to this shoggti's Braincloud for 24 hours.

action.name: Fascination (1/Day)
entries: The shoggti changes its coloration and posture to create a beguiling display that overloads the senses of creatures who can see it. Each creature within 30 feet of the shoggti that is not a fiend must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. At the end of each of the {@condition incapacitated} creature's turns or whenever it takes damage, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to
Fascination for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The akop can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The akop's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the akop can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Wisdom Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) psychic damage, and the target's Wisdom score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. The target dies if this reduces its Wisdom to
Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: De wapenaanvallen van de bonedreg zijn magisch.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} om te raken, re ach 5 ft., één doelwit. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) doorborende schade.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: De wapenaanvallen van de bonedreg zijn magisch.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} om te raken, reikwijdte 10 ft., één doel. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) snijschade.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Armageddon beast fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Armageddon beast has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Armageddon beast's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The Armageddon beast has seven heads. While it has more than one head, the Armageddon beast has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

Whenever the Armageddon beast takes 80 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads, of the attacker's choice, dies. If all its heads die, the Armageddon beast dies. It takes about a month for the Armageddon beast to regrow a severed head.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the Armageddon beast has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The Armageddon beast deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the Armageddon beast sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Armageddon beast can use its Frightful Presence.
It then makes as many bite attacks as it has heads. It can substitute a claws attack for up to two bite attacks and one of its breath weapons for three bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 1d20 + 10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}49 ({@damage 6d12 + 10}) slashing damage. If the Armageddon beast scores a critical hit, roll damage dice four times, instead of twice.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge}
entries: Each of the Armageddon beast's heads possesses a different breath weapon. The following breath weapons each correspond to one of its seven heads and recharge separately.
When the Armageddon beast uses a breath weapon, it breathes in a
90-foot cone, with the effects determined by which head breathed.
If one of the beast's heads has been severed, it loses access to that head's breath weapon.

action.name: 1. Acid Breath
entries: Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: 2. Annihilation Breath
entries: One creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 20} Will saving throw or take 90 ({@damage 20d8}) necrotic damage. If the damage drops the target to 0 hit points, it and everything it was wearing and carrying short of an artifact disappear, utterly erased from existence. An artifact drops to the ground below the space the target occupied. A target erased from existence cannot be restored to life by any means.

action.name: 3. Cold Breath
entries: Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 40 ({@damage 9d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: 4. Lightning Breath
entries: Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 ({@damage 9d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: 5. Petrification Breath
entries: Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

action.name: 6. Thunder Breath
entries: Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 7d12}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: 7. Torpor Breath
entries: Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes affected by torpor for 1 minute. While affected by torpor, the creature makes attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws with disadvantage; halves its speed; and cannot use reactions. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the Armageddon beast's choice that is within 120 feet of the Armageddon beast and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the Armageddon beast's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The Armageddon beast makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The Armageddon beast moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Breath Weapon (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Armageddon beast uses one of its breath weapons.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

trait.name: Burst of Speed {@recharge}
entries: As a bonus action, the golem takes the
Dash action.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes four melee attacks.

action.name: Barbed Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The golem has four barbed tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The urhydra has seven heads. While it has more than one head, the urhydra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the urhydra takes 50 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all of its heads die, the urhydra dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken acid or fire damage since its last turn. The urhydra regains 15 hit points for each head regrown this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the urhydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the urhydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The urhydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Luring Song
entries: The urhydra sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the urhydra that can hear the song must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the song ends. The urhydra must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the urhydra has three or fewer living heads.

While {@condition charmed} by the urhydra, a target is {@condition incapacitated} and ignores the songs of other urhydras. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 feet away from the urhydra, the target must move on its turn toward the urhydra by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet. The target doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the urhydra, the target can repeat the saving throw. A {@condition charmed} target can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If the saving throw is successful, the effect on it ends.
A target that successfully saves is immune to this urhydra's song for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The urhydra makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The urhydra moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Crush (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The urhydra shifts its prodigious bulk. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Blasphemous Sigils
entries: Once per round, when Irecunda takes damage, the sigils twist and writhe, issuing an unholy light. Each creature within 20 feet of Irecunda must make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Inescapable Evil
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 120 feet of Irecunda must succeed on a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw or be moved {@dice 1d12 x 10} feet toward Irecunda.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Irecunda fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Irecunda has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Irecunda's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Irecunda deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Titanic Collapse
entries: When Irecunda drops to 0 hit points, he falls {@condition prone} into a 50-foot cube of space originating from a point in his space.

Irecunda's body deals 55 ({@damage 10d10}) bludgeoning damage to everything on the ground in the cube. A creature that would take this damage can make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the damage on a successful save, or being knocked {@condition prone} and trapped beneath Irecunda's body on a failed one. A creature trapped beneath Irecunda's body can make a {@dc 20} Strength (Athletics) check as an action to escape.

trait.name: Trample
entries: When Irecunda moves through a space occupied by a creature smaller than him, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage and fall {@condition prone}. A creature makes this saving throw only during
Irecunda's turn, regardless of how many times he moves through the creature's space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Irecunda makes two slam attacks and one gore attack.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}55 ({@damage 8d10 + 10}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 26} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}62 ({@damage 8d12 + 10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Corrupting Expulsion {@recharge}
entries: Irecunda spews a river of filth from his mouth into a 120-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) acid damage and 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies, and a manes rises from the corpse and acts immediately after Irecunda in the initiative count. The manes is under Irecunda's control.

action.name: Roar {@recharge}
entries: Irecunda throws back his head and emits a magical roar. Each creature within 1,000 feet of Irecunda and able to hear the roar must make a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw. Each creature that fails the saving throw becomes {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.

While {@condition frightened} in this way, the creature is also {@condition deafened}. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Irecunda makes either a slam attack or a gore attack.

legendary.name: Crushing Steps
entries: Irecunda moves without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Roar (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Irecunda uses his roar or recharges his roar.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Jalie's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). Jalie can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Jalie is an 18th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). Jalie has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Jalie fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Jalie's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Jalie is destroyed while he has a phylactery, he gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all his hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: Jalie has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Jalie makes two attacks: one with his claws and one with his head butt.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Head Butt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Voice of Maleficence {@recharge}
entries: Jalie speaks to one creature within 30 feet of him. If the target can hear him, the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition stunned} for 1 minute.

While {@condition stunned} in this way, the target must answer truthfully any question Jalie asks. The {@condition stunned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Jalie's Voice of Maleficence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Jalie casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Claws (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Jalie makes a claws attack.

legendary.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Jalie fixes his gaze on one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Jalie's Frightening Gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of Jalie must make a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with silver weapons

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Krotep's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}). Krotep can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Krotep fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Krotep has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Krotep's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Krotep makes three attacks: two with his whip and one with his snapping claws.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) thunder damage.

action.name: Snapping Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. Krotep can have one creature {@condition grappled} at a time, and attacks with his snapping claws hit automatically against a creature he has {@condition grappled}.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Krotep makes a melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Krotep moves up to his speed.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Krotep innately casts a spell.

monster.name: Necroripper
languages: understands Abyssal and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the necroripper can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Fiend Destroyer
entries: The necroripper has advantage on attack rolls it makes against fiends, and its attacks deal an extra {@damage 3d6} damage to fiends.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The necroripper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The necroripper has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The necroripper's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the necroripper reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the necroripper can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The necroripper makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Nekhet is a 17th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks).
Nekhet has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Nekhet fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: De duivel is in het voordeel bij reddingsslagen tegen spreuken en andere magische effecten.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: De wapenaanvallen van de duivel zijn magisch.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nekhet makes two quarterstaff attacks.

action.name: Toxic Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Nekhet makes a melee attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Nekhet moves up to her speed.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Nekhet casts a spell.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the phlogiston monitor or hits with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The skulldugger's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 11}). The skulldugger can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skulldugger makes a claws attack and a gore attack.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The soul taker's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 23}). The soul taker can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: A soul taker can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

trait.name: Horrific Appearance
entries: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the soul taker and can see the soul taker must make a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the soul taker is within its line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the soul taker's Horrific Appearance for the next 24 hours.

Unless the target is surprised, the target can avert its eyes and avoid making the initial saving throw. Until the start of its next turn, a creature that averts its eyes has disadvantage on attack rolls against the soul taker.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the soul taker can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: While in sunlight, the soul taker has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The soul taker makes two scythe attacks.

action.name: Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature and not a construct or undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or reduce its hit point maximum by the amount of damage it took from this attack. If the reduction drops the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies and the soul taker claims its soul. A creature whose soul has been claimed cannot be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

action.name: Howl of Sorrow (1/Day)
entries: The soul taker lets loose a shriek of heartrending sorrow and soul-chilling fear. Each creature within 60 feet of the soul taker that can hear its shriek must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Pain Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) psychic damage, and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or experience the pain the spawn of Marbas endures every day. The target gains one level of {@condition exhaustion}. If the target succeeds on the saving throw, it becomes immune to this spawn of Marbas's Pain Touch for 24 hours.

action.name: Color Burst {@recharge}
entries: A spawn of Marbas can use an action to turn its skin translucent and expose its inner organs, which pulse with chaotic energy. Each creature within 20 feet of the spawn of

Marbas and that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. At the end of each of the creature's turns, it can repeat the saving throw and ends the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw or ends the effect on itself becomes immune to this spawn of
Marbas's Color Burst for 24 hours.

trait.name: Cloud of Flies
entries: Flies swarm around the stitchface in a 5-foot radius centered on the stitchface's space and move with it when it moves.

When a creature starts its turn in the area, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage and become {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect. If the stitchface takes fire damage, it loses its Cloud of Flies until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Spray of Maggots
entries: When the stitchface takes piercing or slashing damage, it spurts maggots at one creature within 5 feet of it. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the stitchface must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stitchface's Stench for 24 hours.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Engulf
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and if the creature is Medium or smaller, the stitchface enters the creature's space and the creature becomes {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The stitchface can grapple just one creature at a time, and it cannot attack while it has a creature {@condition grappled}.

At the start of each of the stitchface's turns, the maggots filling its body feed on the creature the stitchface has {@condition grappled}. The creature must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage on a failure, or just half the damage on a success.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The stygian interloper can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: A stygian interloper has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: A stygian interloper's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The stygian interloper can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid who has fallen prey to the mind-erasing powers of the River Styx, or back into its true form.
Its statistics are the same in each form, though the interloper gains all of the stricken individual's memories, in a sense becoming the person whose form it adopts.

trait.name: Styx Immunity
entries: The stygian interloper is immune to the memorystealing effects of the River Styx.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Vashtuk's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 23}, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). Vashtuk can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Vashtuk knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Fallen Weapons
entries: Vashtuk's weapon attacks are magical. When
Vashtuk hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Vashtuk fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Vashtuk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Vashtuk can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

trait.name: Unsettling Presence
entries: A 150-foot radius of disturbance extends out from Vashtuk, moves with him, and spreads around corners. Each beast that starts its turn in the area or that moves into it must make a {@dc 23} Wisdom saving throw. The creature becomes {@condition frightened} for 1 minute on a failed save, or becomes immune to Vashtuk's Unsettling
Presence for 24 hours on a successful one. A creature {@condition frightened} in this way must take the Dash action on each of its turns to move away from Vashtuk by the safest available route.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Vashtuk makes two Blighted Blade attacks. Vashtuk can substitute an Accursed Touch attack for one of these attacks.

action.name: Blighted Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d4 + 6}) piercing damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Accursed Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one fey, humanoid, or giant. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage. In addition, the target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. An {@condition incapacitated} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A target that saves against this effect becomes immune to Vashtuk's Accursed Touch for 24 hours.

action.name: Slaying Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature that has 100 hit points or fewer, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or die.

legendary.name: Disappear
entries: Vashtuk casts the {@spell invisibility} spell.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Vashtuk magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Foul Temptation (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Vashtuk casts the {@spell suggestion} spell

item.name: Stasis cage
entries: The six walls of this glass container have been etched with arcane symbols and magical formulae. One side is hinged, allowing items or creatures up to Small size to be placed within. The box can hold one Small creature or two Tiny creatures. Anything within a closed stasis cage is placed into a state of suspended animation. For the occupants, time ceases to flow. The occupant does not age, all bodily functions cease, and it cannot be harmed in any way. The effect lasts until the door opens.

legendaryGroup.name: Mother Igwyre
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Mother Igwyre takes a lair action to cause one of the listed effects. Mother Igwyre can't use the same effect two rounds in a row.
• Mother Igwyre casts hallucinatory terrain.

• A strand of webbing falls on one creature Mother Igwyre chooses within 60 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or become restrained. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 22 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 30; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

• Mother Igwyre targets one creature she can see within 120 feet of her and floods its mind with overwhelming grief. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become stunned. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
regionalEffects: Mother Igwyre's foul nature and blessings bestowed on her by Ulasta have warped the landscape around her lair, creating one or more of the following effects:
• Creatures within 5 miles of the lair can hear faint sobbing coming from all around them. Every now and then they hear, "My children, my poor, poor children."
• A light rain falls from the sky within 5 miles of the lair. The rain has the salty taste of tears.
• Each creature that uses a holy symbol as a spellcasting focus experiences discomfort and anxiety, almost as if people were whispering foul things about them.

• Creatures moving away from Mother Igwyre's lair treat the terrain as if it were difficult terrain as roots rise to trip, vines stretch out to snare, and webs spread between the dead trees to catch and pull at creatures trying to escape.
If Mother Igwyre dies, these regional effects immediately end.

legendaryGroup.name: Cresil
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Cresil takes a lair action to cause one of the effects listed. Cresil can't use the same effect two rounds in a row.
